sections.title: Introductions & Role Context
sections.goal: Understand the SRE's background, current responsibilities, and relation to Nimbus Observability
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your current role and how it intersects with observability?
What was your first involvement with the Nimbus Observability project?
How does your oncall experience shape your approach to monitoring and alerting?

sections.title: Current Observability Setup
sections.goal: Explore the existing OpenTelemetry pipelines, SLO definitions, and incident analytics tooling
sample_questions: Could you describe the current telemetry data flow from services into the observability stack?
What are the key SLOs you track for Nimbus?
How do you ensure incident analytics feeds back into system improvements?

sections.title: Runbooks and Incident Response
sections.goal: Dive into RB-OBS-033 Alert Fatigue Tuning and related operational practices
sample_questions: When was the last time you used RB-OBS-033 in a live incident?
How do you decide when to tune alerts versus when to escalate?
Can you share an example where runbook guidance prevented alert fatigue?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify and understand dependencies between Nimbus Observability and other Novereon projects
sample_questions: Which other projects feed data into Nimbus Observability?
Have you coordinated with the Helios Datalake or Mercury Messaging teams?
How do upstream changes in Poseidon Networking affect your telemetry pipelines?

sections.title: User Experience of Observability Tools
sections.goal: Assess the usability of dashboards, alerts, and analytics from an SRE perspective
sample_questions: What’s your process for navigating from an alert to the root cause?
How intuitive are the current dashboards for diagnosing incidents?
If you could redesign one element of the observability UI, what would it be?

sections.title: Future Improvements & Risks
sections.goal: Discuss potential enhancements, tradeoffs, and risks in evolving the observability platform
sample_questions: What’s the highest-risk change you see coming for Nimbus?
How do you balance adding new telemetry with controlling costs and complexity?
Can you recall a decision where you had to trade off depth of metrics against system performance?
